```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gganimate)
library(sf)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(readxl)
library(viridis)

```

```{r}

cm_2021 <- read_excel("data/child_marriage/cm_2021.xlsx")

cm_women_18 <- cm_2021 %>% 
  select(Country, w15) %>% 
  mutate(w15 = as.numeric(w15)) %>% 
  na.omit()

countries <- ne_countries(returnclass = "sf", scale = "medium")
cm_w15 <- ne_countries(returnclass = "sf", scale = "medium") %>% 
  select(admin) %>% 
  left_join(cm_women_18, by = c("admin" = "Country"))


ggplotly(ggplot()+
  geom_sf(countries, mapping = aes(fill = NA)) +
  geom_sf(cm_w15 , mapping = aes(fill = as.factor(w15), text = admin)) +
  theme(legend.position="none") + 
  labs(title = "Child Marriage Rate for women below 15 yrs"))


```
